ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Audit log, not possible to know who is the user
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? Open audit log and you cant see the username. We have many people with same letters in first and last name. ![image](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/117290601/c57fb659-7169-4f89-9ccc-fd394e114834) ### Desired Behavior Username should be under the circle image ### Project Details Node: **v18.18.2** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.202.10** ### Attachments _No response_
